name: Crystal Aero Group, Inc
about: Crystal Aero Group, Inc., founded in 1978, is a full-service FBO and flight school located on the beautiful Nature Coast of Florida. Headquartered next to the Crystal River, the school is dedicated to providing the highest quality flight training in a personalized and family-like setting. As a Part 141 school, Crystal Aero Group adheres to rigorous FAA standards, allowing students to earn certifications with fewer overall hours. The school offers a range of programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications. With a long-standing service lease at the county-owned Crystal River Airport since 1983, Crystal Aero Group is committed to serving pilots and students worldwide while supporting local businesses and residents as a vibrant transportation hub. Owned and operated by experienced aviation professionals, the school ensures a safe, comprehensive, and enriching learning experience for all students.
